quickSteps: Open the pair BTC→XMR on ETZ Swap and review the quote.
Update BTC/XMR wallets, back up seeds, and generate a fresh XMR receiving address.
Choose rate type: Fixed (exact amount) or Floating (tighter spreads).
Send a small BTC test transaction; confirm XMR arrival and payout behavior.
Send the main BTC amount within the time window; verify incoming XMR.

seo.title: BTC to XMR Swap: Private, Secure, Efficient
seo.description: Practical BTC→XMR guide: privacy, fungibility, execution steps, costs, and pitfalls to avoid.
